content.body: Anybody know of tests anywhere for “valid email address” as defined at https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/input.html#valid-e-mail-address ?
smaug: yeah I think I filed an issue on that.
content.formatted_body: smaug: yeah I think I filed an issue on that.

content.body: Hi, I'm working on a possible proposal to improve window.print I only see a reference about the dialog and the print media.  Where should I start this discussion? TIA
Dan Howard: I might search through whatwg/html issues on GitHub first to see if anything has already been proposed. But failing that there would be a good place.
content.formatted_body: Dan Howard: I might search through whatwg/html issues on GitHub first to see if anything has already been proposed. But failing that there would be a good place.

content.body: (Though I would not expect there to be too much implementer interest in improving that API per se.)

smaug: sefeng: does https://github.com/whatwg/dom/pull/1342#discussion_r1973386577 match how Gecko feels about `getSelection()` or are you okay with it exposing the shadow tree when the end user selects shadow tree content?
content.formatted_body: smaug: sefeng: does https://github.com/whatwg/dom/pull/1342#discussion_r1973386577 match how Gecko feels about getSelection() or are you okay with it exposing the shadow tree when the end user selects shadow tree content?
